text: The Russia men's national field hockey team represents Russia in international field hockey competitions. ==Tournament record== Russia has never qualified for the World Cup or the Summer Olympics. They have competed four times in the EuroHockey Championship where their best result was the seventh place in 2011. ===European Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|EuroHockey Championship record |- !Year !Round !Position !
